DOC.brief_summary: The winter break within German Professional Football Leagues shorten season 2009/2010 6.5 3.5 week . That might repercussions injury incidence either way , positive negative . On one hand , recovery time winter shorter , might lead increase risk injury . On hand , allow good spread game second round , thus reduce amount so-called `` English week '' , turn could reduce number injury . This study compare injury incidence season 2008/2009 ( long winter break ) season 2009/2010 ( short winter break ) via questionnaire accordance UEFA/FIFA injury evaluation criterion .
DOC.criteria: German professional male soccer player Loss professional status soccer player
